LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Spear.label: 창
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Spear.description: A polearm tipped with a sharp point for stabbing opponents in melee combat.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Mace.label: 철퇴
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Mace.description: A refined club, engineered for efficient swinging and deadly impacts.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Club.label: 몽둥이
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Club.description: A club is the oldest human weapon. It is a shaped blunt weapon for bashing enemies to death. Primitive but effective.
LanguageData.NorbalMeleeWeapon_ShortSwordtwo.label: 노르망족 스워드
LanguageData.NorbalMeleeWeapon_ShortSwordtwo.descript: Reliable and deadly in melee combat. Comes with added Nordic flair
LanguageData.NorbalMeleeWeapon_ShortSword.label: 히어로닉 스워드
LanguageData.NorbalMeleeWeapon_ShortSword.description: Reliable and deadly in melee combat. Comes with added Arabic flair.
LanguageData.NorbalMeleeWeapon_Ax.label: 노르망족 전쟁도끼
LanguageData.NorbalMeleeWeapon_Bigax.label: 전쟁도끼
